column4: hey, I've just mounted a new hard drive in ubuntu 11.04 and I'd like to move my home directory, I imagine there's a bit more to it that just moving the folder
entry in fstab for the second hdd
were it me, I'd boot single-user, move the user directory to /media/data/username, change /etc/fstab to mount that device as /home, and reboot single-user to make sure it's okay.
